dcterms:creator: M. Paul
H. Yamamoto
E. Sumita
S. Nakamura
dcterms:description: A collection of sentences that bilingual travel experts consider useful for people going to or coming from another country. This corpus contains around 160,000 parallel sentences but only around 20,000 sentences and 180,000 words are actively used for machine translation purposes.
dcterms:title: Basic Traveller Expressions Corpus (Btec)

dcterms:creator: P. A. Chew
S. J. Verzi
T. L. Bauer
J. T. McClain
dcterms:description: A parallel corpus containing around 28,000 sentences and approximately 800,000 tokens per language. It is the worldâ€™s most translated book and covers a variety of literary styles including narrative, poetry, and correspondence.
dcterms:title: Holy Bible

dcterms:creator: A. Rafalovitch
R. Dale
dcterms:description: A six-language parallel corpus consisting of 2100 United Nations General Assembly resolutions with translations in the six official languages of the United Nations, containing an average of around 3 million tokens per language.
dcterms:title: United Nations (UN) Corpus
